title: How to Make Barm Brack

steps.headline: Put the yeast, sugar and milk together in a bowl; beat until the milk becomes frothy.
Put the flour, sugar and spice in a separate bowl, and then incorporate the butter with your fingers.
Pour the milk mixture into the bowl with the flour, and beat the ingredients together for 5 minutes, or until dough forms.
Knead the dough for two minutes, then work in the fruit and salt.
Place the dough in a warm bowl, cover with a towel, and allow it to rise for an hour or until it has doubled in size.
Knead the dough again and place in a floured/greased 8 inch (20.3 cm) diameter cake pan; allow an extra 25 minutes of rising time.
Bake at 400 °F (204 °C) on the top rack of the oven, for 30-45 minutes or until toothpick inserted into the cake's center comes out clean.
Glaze the finished cake with a simple sugar syrup made from 2 teaspoons of sugar dissolved in 3 teaspoons of boiling water, if you like.

text: Put the yeast, sugar and milk together in a bowl; beat until the milk becomes frothy.  Put the flour, sugar and spice in a separate bowl, and then incorporate the butter with your fingers.  Pour the milk mixture into the bowl with the flour, and beat the ingredients together for 5 minutes, or until dough forms.  Knead the dough for two minutes, then work in the fruit and salt.  Place the dough in a warm bowl, cover with a towel, and allow it to rise for an hour or until it has doubled in size.  Knead the dough again and place in a floured/greased 8 inch (20.3 cm) diameter cake pan; allow an extra 25 minutes of rising time.  Bake at 400 °F (204 °C) on the top rack of the oven, for 30-45 minutes or until toothpick inserted into the cake's center comes out clean.  Glaze the finished cake with a simple sugar syrup made from 2 teaspoons of sugar dissolved in 3 teaspoons of boiling water, if you like.  Finished.
